title: Space Exploration - Sci-Fi Music Vol.1
description: This pack offers 13 unique and varied music tracks which will suite any space or sci-fi project! The pack contains different edits of the tracks for hassle free implementation.
longDescription:
Listen to the Previews

Watch the Teaser


The 1st Volume of ‘Space Exploration’ music pack has landed! This is an immersive collection of 13 space and sci-fi themed music tracks. These tracks were produced and composed to incorporate different styles to fit a wide array of emotions associated with the theme of space, from obscure loneliness of the most distant planets to the joys of discovering a new home.

Each track was made to loop seamlessly to eliminate the burden of having to use audio middleware and for the developers to easily implement the music into their game/ projects. Some tracks also contain alternate versions so that the same track may be used in different circumstances of the game.


  • 13 High Quality Tracks
  • 52 WAV files
  • Different Edits for easy implementation
  • Different styles for different gameplays


About the music

I produced the music using both hardware and software, designing sounds that would fit with the overall theme. Whether it is sci-fi pulsating rhythms or vast ambient drones, this pack explores different musical moods and emotions to fit different styles of gameplay.

A short user manual has been compiled which contains information about each piece including description, suitable uses, and musical information.


What does the future hold?

I plan to release more space and sci-fi related music packs that focus on one specific style so that more music can be incorporated into the same game.

I would also readily accept community suggestions so I can include them in my next music pack.


For inquiries and suggestions email: daniel.sinagra@hotmail.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 52

Number of Audio Cues: 52

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/ 16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 72 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No)

Mac: (Yes/No)

Documentation: User Manual: Contains track and edit descriptions to help you implement the tracks.

Important/Additional Notes:
